OOC: Welcome back. As for the chars you gave me, we went and fought, but
then found up we were fightingMaximals known as Radicons as well as the
Chosen Mafia and the NDE. With all the confusion the battle stoped. But
then the NDE attacked Hot Rod and the others. So they are now involved
in battle aginst Shockwave, Unitron and some others. Rixer is pretty
damaged. Read the last few posts on it to see the exact situation.
